messages.title: WE CAN’T GO ON LIKE THIS.
messages.content: It’s time for change. The general election is just weeks away now. This is a big moment for Britain.

messages.title: IT’S TIME FOR CHANGE.
messages.content: We will cut the deficit, not the NHS. We will act on the economy. Every family knows, the longer you leave a debt problem, the worse it gets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will cut the deficit, not the NHS.
We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.
We will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.

issues.economy: We will act on the economy. Every family knows, the longer you leave a debt problem, the worse it gets.
issues.education: We will stand up for families, sort out our schools and fight back against crime.
issues.governance: We will act on the economy to restore responsibility to our society.
issues.health: We will cut the deficit, not the NHS. We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet makes a direct appeal to prevent Gordon Brown from staying in office and underscores the necessity for change.
